util
Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
  util.SettingsManager

public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object

util.SettingsManager provides a generic way to configure BiSciCol core classes from a properties file. The basic idea is that any object that supports the Configurable interface can be passed a util.SettingsManager, and it will then use the util.SettingsManager to configure itself. util.SettingsManager is implemented as a singleton to ensure that all BiSciCol objects use common configuration information.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static SettingsManager getInstance()
Get a reference to the global util.SettingsManager instance. If this is the first request for a util.SettingsManager instance, then a new util.SettingsManager object will be created using the default properties file, which is expected to be located in the "classes" directory of the project build directory.

Returns:
A reference to the global util.SettingsManager object.

getInstance

public static SettingsManager getInstance(java.lang.String propsfile)
Get a reference to the global util.SettingsManager object, specifying a properties file to use. If this is the first request for a util.SettingsManager instance, then a new util.SettingsManager object will be created using the specified properties file. Otherwise, the existing util.SettingsManager will be returned and the specified properties file is ignored.

Parameters:
propsfile - A properties file to use in initializing the util.SettingsManager.
Returns:
A reference to the global util.SettingsManager object.

getPropertiesFile

public java.lang.String getPropertiesFile()
Get the path of the properties file associated with this util.SettingsManager.

Returns:
The path of the properties file used by this util.SettingsManager.

setPropertiesFile

public void setPropertiesFile(java.lang.String propsfile)
Specify a properties file for this util.SettingsManager to use.

Parameters:
propsfile - The path to a properties file.

loadProperties

public void loadProperties()
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Attempt to load the properties file associated with this util.SettingsManager. This method must be called to properly initialize the util.SettingsManager before it can be used by Configurable classes.

Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException

retrieveValue

public java.lang.String retrieveValue(java.lang.String key)
Get the value associated with the specified key. If the key is not found in the properties file, then an empty string is returned.

Parameters:
key - The key to search for in the properties file.
Returns:
The value associated with the key if it exists, otherwise, an empty string.

retrieveValue

public java.lang.String retrieveValue(java.lang.String key,
                                      java.lang.String defaultval)
Get the value associated with the specified key; return a default value if the key is not found. The string specified by defaultval is returned as the default value if the key cannot be found.

Parameters:
key - The key to search for in the properties file.
defaultval - The default value to return if the key cannot be found.
Returns:
The value associated with the key if it exists, otherwise, the specified default value.
